boomerang.name: Boomerang
boomerang.description: <y>9%</c> chance to toss a <y>boomerang</c> with your <b>basic attacks</c>. Pierces enemies for <y>100% <c_stack>(+100% per stack) <y>TOTAL damage</c> before returning.

metalDetector.name: Metal Detector
metalDetector.pickup: Discover bonus temporary items when activating the Teleporter.
metalDetector.description: On <b>activating the Teleporter</c>, discover <b>3 temporary items</c> <c_stack>(increase rarity per stack)</c>. Lasts <y>90 seconds</c>.

monkeyMask.name: Second Soul
monkeyMask.pickup: Increase attack speed and guarantee Critical strikes after taking damage.
monkeyMask.description: Gain <y>18% attack speed</c> and <y>100% critical strike chance</c> for <y>2 <c_stack>(+1 per stack) <y>seconds</c> after getting hurt.

speedOnPickup.name: Record
speedOnPickup.description: <b>Collecting an item</c> increases <y>movement speed</c> by <b>20% <c_stack>(+20% per stack)</c> for <b>15 seconds</c>.

xray.name: X-ray Tube
xray.pickup: Discover an additional item on boss kill.
xray.description: <y>Boss monsters</c> yield an additional <b>1</c> <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> <b>items</c> on death.
